page.title: 16MORTON STANLEY PARK REDDITCH
page.content: It is many years ago since {Morton {Stanley,}a farmer, left his land for the people of Redditch to enjoy. Today Morton Stanley Park is in a time of change,and in years to come it is hoped that it will be an attraction for people to visit.Already there are some pleasant walks,and paths around the park.It is a pretty area neatly set out with grasslands and woods dotted about. There is a picnic area with tables,and play area with swings and a slide. The new plans include a nature trail round coppiced and ornamental woodlands as well as wildflower meadows. More footpaths are also proposed, and formal playing fields, and a toboggan run. When completed { {Morton Stanley Park}will be important urban recreational land, in a fast growing residential area.
